Package edu.citadel.cprl.ast

Class Expression

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.AST
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.Expression
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryExpr, ConstValue, FunctionCall, UnaryExpr, Variable
public abstract class Expression
extends AST
Base class for all CPRL expressions.

    • emitBranch

      public void emitBranch​(boolean condition, java.lang.String label) throws CodeGenException, java.io.IOException
      For Boolean expressions, the method emits the appropriate branch opcode based on the condition. For example, if the expression is a "<" relational expression and the condition is false, then the opcode "BGE" is emitted. The method defined in this class works correctly for Boolean constants, Boolean named values, and "not" expressions. It should be overridden for other Boolean expression ASTs (e.g., RelationalExpr).
      Parameters:
      condition - the condition that determines the branch to be emitted.
      label - the label for the branch destination.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is a problem writing to the target file.
      CodeGenException - if the method is unable to generate appropriate target code.
